generated_text:
- road: The cobblestone surface in the center of the image, where vehicles and cyclists are moving, is the road.
- sidewalk: The paved areas on both sides of the road, bordered by metal posts and where pedestrians are walking, are sidewalks.
- building: The structures with windows, signs, and storefronts on both sides of the street are buildings.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are visible along the sidewalks and in the background.
- terrain: The grassy area in the background on the right side is terrain.
- sky: The open sky is visible above the buildings and trees.
- person: Multiple individuals are visible walking or sitting on benches along the sidewalks.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle in the middle of the road.
- car: A dark-colored car is parked on the side of the road.
- truck: A white truck with a blue container is parked on the side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the right side of the road.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked on the right side of the road.
- pole: Metal poles are visible along the sidewalks, used to separate pedestrian areas from the road.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign is visible on the right side of the road.
